name: Everything is predestined
description:
Everything is predestined - this is a small platformer in which you can be a mad scientist who created a time machine at a nuclear power plant. Small missions await you that can help you overcome the unpleasant outcome that has arisen due to the development of the scientist.


Control:
It's pretty simple, in this game you only need three buttons.
A - move to the left, D - move to the right, E - use.
Nothing complicated, right?

The game is still in development, so minor bugs are possible. Also, there are not many levels and tasks, but there are more of them)
